subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Michigan State’s struggles early this season put its N.C.A.A. tournament appearance streak in jeopardy, but the Spartans’ longtime coach has orchestrated a turnaround.
snippet: Michigan State’s struggles early this season put its N.C.A.A. tournament appearance streak in jeopardy, but the Spartans’ longtime coach has orchestrated a turnaround.
